Quick search

3. GLOFRIM content¶

GLOFRIM can be downloaded from GitHub including the following content:

  1. GLOFRIM code
  2. PCR-GLOBWB with BMI adapter

3.1. GLOFRIM code¶

This is the core of GLOFRIM.

3.2. PCR-GLOBWB¶

The provided model version is 2.0.3 and contains most features of the default PCR-GLOBWB model.

Warning

Due to the evolving nature of model code and thus also of PCR-GLOBWB, recently added functionality of PCR-GLOBWB may not be available in the here downloadable version. If you encounter any issues, please contact the developers!
